Package abyss.plugin.api

Class Bank

java.lang.Object
abyss.plugin.api.Bank
All Implemented Interfaces:
abyss.plugin.api.extensions.ExtensionContainer<abyss.plugin.api.extensions.Extension>
public final class Bank extends Object implements abyss.plugin.api.extensions.ExtensionContainer<abyss.plugin.api.extensions.Extension>
Provides access to the local player's bank.
